pyiides
  • Welcome to PYIIDES documentation!
  • View page source

Welcome to PYIIDES documentation!

PyIIDES is a Python implementation of the Insider Incident Data Exchange Standard (IIDES) schema. This package provides tools for the coding, storage, and sharing of data related specifically to insider incidents of all kinds.
